name: Snake Up
description:
Control a Snake that will always be moving towards the highest point on your device. Tilt and turn your phone to guide it to food, causing it to grow longer. As you play, you'll unlock new colors to use to customize your snake.

You should also keep an eye out for Scales. These modifiers will add new rules to the game, often making it more difficult. They will drop when you accomplish certain feats in the game. Pick them up and you will be able to activate them from the main menu.
